item.title: Boostagram Ball - Episode 10
item.description:
Boostagram Ball Episode 10 for October 4th 2023

Boostagram Ball is a music podcast where we automatically switch to the artists' wallet when playing their songs

Use a modern podcast app from podcastapps.com to support the show and the music:

  • Fountain
  • Podverse
  • Podfans
  • Curiocaster
  • Podfriend
  • Podcast Guru
  • Podcast Addict
  • LNBeats.com
  • More added daily!

Music on Today's Show:

Nate Johnivan - Back Road
Richard - Rules Without Rulers
Ainsley Costello - Rescued
CityBeach - GO
Ryan Fonda - Only A Call Away
Drawing Monsters - Tiny Ships
PlebRap - Money Printer Go - Too Bit to Fail
The Doerfels - Bloodshot Lies
Mr. Information - Mr. J
Enid Mollel - Fly (feat B. LEO)
Bobby Shell - Beefsteak and Tradwives
Sara Jade - Wait Destiny
Mandelbro - Eyes
Choreboy - We're in It for the Money
Jessica Lynne Witty - We're Not Even Drinking
Jeremy Oliveria - Looking For You (Feat. Kellin Quinn)

https://podcastindex.social/@Meremortals/110936900795092897

https://www.boostagramball.com/
